Class RemoteMetricsExtension

java.lang.Object
  akka.remote.RemoteMetricsExtension
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExtensionId<RemoteMetrics>, ExtensionIdProvider
public class RemoteMetricsExtension
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExtensionId<RemoteMetrics>, ExtensionIdProvider

INTERNAL API Extension that keeps track of remote metrics, such as max size of different message types.
